Translations.Text: bu xiwang yu wo xiang hui zhe [ru fouren fuhuo ri zhe] shuo:“Weisheme bu jiang tianshi gei women ne? Weisheme bu rang women kanjian women de zhu ne?” Tamen que yi wangzizunda, que yi danibudao.
Dang tamen kanjian tianshimen di na ri, zai na ri, fanzui zhe jue meiyou xixun. Tamen [tianshi] jiang shuo:“Nimen jue meiyou renhe xixun [jue buneng jinru leyuan].”
Wo jiang chuli tamen suo zuo de shangong, wo jiang shi zhexie shangong bian cheng piaofu de chen'ai.
Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang you yige zui hao de jusuo he zuimei de xiuxi chu.
Zai na ri, tian jiang tong yun yidao polie, tianshimen jiang zhuangyan xiajiang.
Zai na ri, zhuquan shi zhenshi de, shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de, na ri dui bu xinyang zhe jiang shi yige yanli de rizi.
Zai na ri, bu yi zhe jiang yao zhuoshou shuo:“Yaoshi wo ceng yu shizhe [mu sheng] xuanze tong yitiao dao duo hao a!
Wo zhen gaisi! Yaoshi wo bu ba mou ren dang pengyou duo hao a!
Jiaohui [“gulanjing”] jianglin wo zhihou, ta que yi you wo beiqi ta. Emo dui ren zong shi beixinqiyi de.”
Shizhe [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zuren que yi beiqi zhe bu “gulanjing”.”
Wo ruci shi fanzui zhe chengwei mei wei xianzhi de diren. Ni de zhu zuyi zuo yindao zhe he yuanzhu zhe.

Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Weisheme “gulanjing” bu yici xing jiang gei ta [mu sheng] ne?” Wo ruci lingxing jiang shi ta, yibian wo yi ci jianding ni [mu sheng] de xin. Wo [genju xuyao] xunxujianjin jiang shi ta [zhu][zai 23 nianjian jiang wan].
Mei dang tamen xiang ni tichu nanti, wo jiu qishi ni zhenli he zui hao de jieshi.
Fan bei paxingzhe jihe yu huo yu zhe [zhu], zhexie ren de chujing shi zui huai de, shi zui yuanli zhengdao de.
Wo que yi ci gei mu sa jingdian [“tao la te”], bing renming ta di gege ha lun zuo ta de zhushou.
Wo shuo:“Ni lia qu jiaohua nage fouren wo de qishi de minzhong ba!”[Zuihou] wo chedi huimiele tamen.
Nu ha de zuren fouren [tamen de] shizhemen shi, wo yan sile tamen, bing shi tamen chengwei renlei de yi zhong jixiang. Wo wei bu yi zhe zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.
[Bei huimie de hai you] a de ren, sa mu de ren he la si de jumin, yiji cijian de xuduo shidai.
Wo wei mei yi shidai de renmen ju chule xuduo jianjie,[dan tamen haishi fouren wo bing zuo'e], wo huimiele mei yi shidai.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] que yijingguo zaoshou e yu qinxi de [lu te shengren de] chengshi. Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian [liu xia de yiji] ma? Bu! Tamen bu xiwang bei fuhuo.
Dang tamen kanjian ni [mu sheng] shi, tamen ba ni dang xiaobing [shuo]:“Zhe [mu sheng] jiushi an la suo paiqian de shizhe ma?
Yao bushi women jianchi chongbai women de shenling, ta jihu shi women beili tamen [naxie shenling]le.” Dang tamen kanjian xingfa shi, na shi tamen jiang zhidao shei shi zui yuanli zhengdao de.
Ni [mu sheng] kanjianguo ba ziji de siyu dang shenling chongbai de ren ma? Nandao ni neng zuo ta de jianhu zhe ma?
Nandao ni renwei tamen da duoshu ren hui qingting huo mingli ma? Tamen haobi yiqun shengchu, qishi, tamen [bi shengchu] geng yuanli zhengdao.
Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ni de zhu zenyang shenzhan yinying ma? Jiaru ta yiyu, ta neng shi yinying jingzhi bu dong. Ranhou, wo yi taiyang zuowei yindao de biaozhi.
Ranhou, wo zhujian shouhui ta.
Shi ta [an la] shi heiye zuowei nimen de beizi, shi shuimian gong [nimen] xiuxi, shi baizhou gong [nimen] suxing [zhu][zuoshi].
Shi ta paiqian feng zai ta jiang en [yu] qian baoxi. Wo cong tiankong jiangxia jiejing de yushui,
yibian jie ci shi kusi de dadi fusu, gong wo suo chuangzao de shengchu he renlei yinyong.
Wo que yi ba yushui [zhu] fenpei zai tamen zhi jian, yibian tamen laoji [an la de enhui], dan da duoshu ren haishi jujue xinyang [an la] bing wang'enfuyi.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi zai mei ge chengshi paiqian yi wei jinggao zhe.
Yinci, ni buyao fucong bu xinyang zhe, ni dang yi “gulanjing” jin zuida nuli [xiang tamen chuanjiao bing] tong tamen douzheng.
Shi ta [an la] shi liang hai [di haishui] ziyou liudong, zhege shi tian de danshui, nage shi ku de xian shui. Ta zai liang hai zhi jian shezhile yige [yinxing] pingzhang [zhu] he jiexian.
Shi ta yong [jing] shui chuangzaole ren, bing wei ta guiding xuetong he hunyin guanxi. Ni de zhu [dui wanshi] shi wanneng de.
Tamen she an la er chongbai dui tamen ji wuyi ye wu hai de dongxi. Bu xinyang zhe zong shi xiezhu emo fankang ziji de zhu [an la].
Wo zhi paiqian ni [mu sheng] zuo baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo bu hui wei ci [xuanchuan an la de qishi] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, dan youzhi zhe ke zi ze yitiao tong xiang ta de zhu de dadao.”
Ni dang xinlai yongsheng bu mie de zhu [an la], dang zanmei songyang ta. Ta zuyi che zhi ta de pu renmen de zuiguo.
Shi ta zai liu rinei chuangzaole tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo.[Ta shi] pu ci zhi zhu [an la]. Guanyu ta [an la] de shuxing, ni [mu sheng] dang qingjiao che zhi zhe [an la].

Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang xiang pu ci zhi zhu koutou” shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu shi shenme? Nandao women yao koubai ni [mu sheng] suo mingling women de ma?” Zhe shi tamen gengjia yanwu [zhenli]. Koutou chu
zansong ta [an la] zhifu! Shi ta zai tiankong chuangzaole tianti, bing zai qizhong anzhi “mingdeng [taiyang]” he canlan de yueliang.
Shi ta wei yuan jieshou jiaohui zhe huo yuan gan'en zhe er shi zhouye lunliu.
Pu ci zhi zhu de pu renmen jiushi zai da dishang qiangong xingzou de ren. Dang yuren yi e yan shanghai tamen shi, tamen jiu yi hewan de yanci huida.
Tamen zheng ye xiang tamen de zhu koutou he zhanli [zhu][ru libai],
tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni shi women mian shou huo yu de xingfa. Huo yu de xingfa que shi feichang tongku de.”
Ta [huo yu] que shi yige elie de guisu he elie de jusuo.
Tamen shiyong [tamen de caiwu] shi, ji bu huihuo [zhu], ye bu linse, er shi zai ci zhi jian jin shou yitiao shizhong zhi dao.
Tamen zhi qiqiu an la, bu qiqiu qita shenling; tamen bu shahai an la jinzhi shahai de shengming, chufei shi weile zhengyi; tamen bu jianyin [zhu]. Shei zuo ci shi [jianyin], shei bi shou chengfa.
Fuhuo ri, ta hai jiang shou jiabei de xingfa, qie shouru de yong ju qizhong,
wei huiguo zi xin, xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai [zhu], zhexie ren, an la jiang ba tamen [guoqu suo gan] de zuiguo bian wei shangong. An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Shei huiguo zi xin bing xingshan, shei que yi zhenzheng gui xin'an la.
Tamen bu zuojia zheng, ruguo tamen yu dao wuliao de shi, tamen jiu zhuangzhong di zou kai;
dang youren yi tamen de zhu de qishi quangao tamen shi, tamen bu hui xiang longzi he xiazi yiyang wudongyuzhong.
Tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni cong women de qizi he houyi zhong ci gei women anwei, qiu ni shi women chengwei jingwei zhe de kaimo.”
Youyu zhexie ren jianren, tamen jiang shou ci gaoji jusuo [leyuan], tamen zai leyuan li [xiangyu shi] jiang huode zhuhe he zhu an.
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi zuimei de guisu he jusuo.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Jiaru nimen [bu xinyang zhe] bu qiqiu ta [an la], wo de zhu [an la] shi bu hui guanxin nimen de. Dan nimen que yi fouren [ta], suoyi, nimen jiang shou yongjiu de xingfa.”
Ta, xi, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhexie shi mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen.
Youyu tamen bu xinyang, ni [mu sheng] yexu hui beifen shang shen.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo neng cong tianshang jiang gei tamen yi zhong jixiang, tamen jiang wei ci fushou tingming.
Mei dang [“gulanjing” zhong] you xin de qishi cong pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi beiqi ta.
Tamen que yi fouren zhenli [“gulanjing”], tamen suo chaoxiao zhishi de houguo jiang jianglin tamen.
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha dadi, wo zenyang shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang qizhong ma?
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Dangshi, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa [zhu][shuo]:“Ni qu jiaohua bu yi de renmin——
falao de renmin ba! Nandao tamen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen bu xiangxin wo,
wo xiongzhong yumen, wo de shetou ye bu lingminle, suoyi, qiu ni paiqian [wo di gege] ha lun [pei wo qu].
Tamen zhikong wo yi xiang zui, wo pa tamen hui shahai wo.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo dique yu nimen tong zai bing qingting [nimen de qiqiu].
Ni lia jian dao falao shi dang [dui ta] shuo:“Wo lia que shi zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] paiqian lai de shizhe,
qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong women yiqi likai ba!”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni [mu sa] dang haizi yang da, erqie ni tong women yiqi shenghuoguo xuduo nian ma?
Ni zuoguo ni suo zuo di na jian shi [sharen], ni shi yige wang'enfuyi de ren.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo zuoguo na jian shi, dan na shi wo [dui an la ji qi qishi] shi wuzhi de.
Youyu wo weiju nimen, suoyi wo taolile nimen. Zhihou, wo de zhu ci gei wo zhihui [zongjiao zhi shi], bing renming wo zuo shizhe.
Ni nuyile yiselie de houyi, zhe jiushi ni zebei wo wang'en ma?”
Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, jiaru nimen quexin.”
Ta [falao] dui zhouwei de ren shuo:“Nandao nimen meiyou tingjian [mu sa suo shuo de] ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe yiding shige fengzi.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi dongfang he xifang ji qizhong yiqie de zhu, jiaru nimen mingli.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Jiaru ni she wo er ling xuan zhuzai, wo bi shi ni chengwei qiufan.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Yaoshi wo xiang ni xianshi yixie ling ren xinfu de shi ne?”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Ni xianshi ba! Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua.”
Yushi ta [mu sa] jiu reng chu ta de shouzhang, na shouzhang turan bian chengle yitiao zhenzheng de dashe.
Ranhou, ta [cong ye xia] chouchu shou lai, na shou zai guanzhong mianqian turan bian de jiebai yaoyan.
Ta [falao] dui zhouwei de shoulingmen shuo:“Zhe que shi yi wei jingzhan de moshu shi,
ta xiang yong ta de moshu ba nimen zhu chu nimen de guotu, nimen you he gaojian?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni zanqie bieguan ta he ta di gege, qing ni paiqian chuanling guan dao ge chengshi qu,
Rang tamen ba suoyou jingzhan de moshu shi [zhu] dou zhao lai jian ni.”
Moshu shimen zai guiding zhi ri anshi jihe qilaile.
Youren dui renmen shuo:“Nimen dou jihe haole ma?
Jiaru moshu shimen huoshengle, women yexu hui zhuisui tamen.”
Dang moshu shimen daoda shi, tamen dui falao shuo:“Jiaru women huoshengle, women hui huode baochou [jiangli] ma?”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Shi de, na shi nimen yiding hui chengwei wo qinxin de ren.”
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen reng [biaoyan] nimen yao reng [biaoyan] de dongxi ba!”
Yushi tamen jiu reng chu tamen de shengzi he shouzhang. Tamen shuo:“Yi falao de quanli fashi! Women yiding shi huosheng zhe.”
Jiezhe mu sa jiu reng chu ta de shouzhang, na shouzhang turan tunmole tamen suo biaoyan de huanshu.
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu.
Tamen shuo:“Women xinyang zhong shijie de zhule,
ji mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

Ta [falao] shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Ta yiding shi nimen de shouling, yiding shi ta jiaoshou nimen moshu de. Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao, wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, wo yiding yao ba nimen quanbu ding si zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Meiguanxi, women yiding yao chong gui women de zhu [an la].
Women zhen de kewang women de zhu hui kuanshu women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian xinyang de.”
Wo qishi mu sa [zhu]:“Ni shuailing wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Yinwei nimen bi jiang bei [falao ji qi jundui] zhuigan.”
Falao paiqian chuanling guan dao ge chengshi qu [shuo]:
“Zhexie ren zhishi yi xiaohuo ren,
tamen dique jinule wo,
women dique you qiangda de jundui.”
Yinci, wo [an la] ba tamen zhu chule [tamen de] guoyuan, quanshui,
caibao he haozhai.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jichengle ta [shangshu caichan].
Tamen [falao de jundui] zai ri chu shi zhuigan tamen.
Dang shuangfang huxiang neng kanjian shi, mu sa de tongbanmen shuo:“Women kuai bei zhui shangle!”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu dique yu wo tong zai, ta hui yindao wo de.”
Yinci, wo qishi mu sa:“Ni yong ni de shouzhang da haishui ba!” Yushi haishui jiu fenkaile, mei yibufen dou xiang yizuo dashan.
Wo rang qiyu de ren [falao de jundui] jiejin na difang.
Wo zhengjiule mu sa ji tong ta zai yiqi de suoyou ren,
ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [falao de jundui].
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Ni dang xiang tamen jiangshu yi bu la xin de gushi [zhu].
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen chongbai de shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi qiancheng gongfeng tamen.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Nimen qiqiu [tamen] shi, tamen neng tingjian ma?
Huozhe tamen neng ci fu gei nimen ma? Huozhe tamen neng jiang huo gei nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Bu, dan women faxian women de zuxian yeshi zheyang zuo de.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Nimen zhidao nimen he nimen de zuxian suo chongbai de shi shenme ma?
Tamen que shi wo de diren, er zhong shijie de zhu [an la] ze bushi.
Ta [an la] chuangzao wo bing yindao wo;
ta gong wo chi de, ci wo yin de;
wo huan bing [zhu] shi, ta shi wo quanyu;
ta jiang shi wo siwang, ranhou you ba wo fuhuo;
shenpan ri, wo xiwang ta neng kuanshu wo de guocuo.”
[Yi bu la xin you shuo]:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci gei wo zhihui [zongjiao zhishi], qiu ni shi wo jinru shan renmen zhi lie;
qiu ni ci wo zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming;
qiu ni shi wo chengwei enze de leyuan de jicheng zhe;
qiu ni kuanshu wo de fuqin, yinwei ta que shi mi wu zhe;
zai tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na ri, qiu ni buyao lingru wo [zhu];
zai na ri, caichan he er nujiang hao wu yichu;
wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin [wei baiguo ouxiang he wei xin deng] lai jian an la de ren liwai.”
[Zai na ri], leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe fujin,
huo yu jiang bei zhanshi zai mi wu zhe mianqian.
You hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she an la er chongbai de ouxiang [xianzai] zai nali? Tamen neng bangzhu nimen ma? Tamen neng zijiu ma?”
Jiang bei touru huo yu de ren shi: Tamen he mi wu zhe,
yiji yi bu lisi de suoyou buxia.
Tamen jiang zai huo yu li zhengbian shuo:
“Yi an la fashi! Women yiqian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
Dangshi, women ba nimen [ouxiang] yu zhong shijie de zhu [an la] tong shou chongbai.
Dique shi fanzui zhe [ru yi bu lisi, zuo'e zhe deng] shi women mi wu de.
[Xianzai], women meiyou renhe qiuqing zhe [neng ti women qiuqing],
meiyou renhe qinmi de pengyou [neng bangzhu women].
Yaoshi women you jihui fanhui [chenshi] duo hao a![Na shi] women yiding zuo xinshi.”
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Nu ha de zuren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi nu ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.”
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“[Zhiyou women zhong] yixie zui beijian de ren zai zhuisui ni, women neng xiangxin ni ma?”
Ta [nu ha] shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen cengjing suo zuo de.
Tamen de qingsuan you wo de zhu [an la] fuze [zhu], jiaru nimen zhidao.
Wo jue bu hui quzhu xinshimen.
Wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Jiaru ni bu tingzhi [xuanchuan], ni bi jiang bei shitou da si.”
Ta [nu ha] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zuren que yi fouren wo,
qiu ni zai wo he tamen zhi jian panjue, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he tong wo zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
Wo zhengjiule ta he tong ta yiqi zai manzai de chuan zhong zhe.
Ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
A de ren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi hudeceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nimen zai mei ge gao dishang jianzao gongdian er bu zhu qizhong ma?
Nimen [wei ziji] jianzao [piaoliang de] gongdian, haoxiang nimen keyi changsheng bulao.
Nimen chengfa bieren shi, nimen youru baojun yiyang chengfa.
Suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Nimen dang jingwei ta [an la], shi ta yi nimen suo bu zhidao de [haoshi] yuanzhu nimen.
Ta ci gei nimen shengchu he ernu,
guoyuan he quanshui.
Wo dique pa nimen zaoshou zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao women, haishi bu quangao women, dui women dou shi yiyang de.
Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.
Women jue bu hui shou chengfa.”
Tamen fouren ta [hu de], suoyi, wo huimiele tamen. Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Sa mu de ren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nandao nimen renwei nimen neng chang'an leyu nimen muqian de xianzhuang ma?
Ji you guoyuan he quanshui,
you nongtian [zhuangjia] he jiaonen de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu,
yiji nimen shulian de zao shan wei wu.
Nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Nimen buyao fucong fanzui zhe de mingling,
tamen [fanzui zhe] zai da dishang zuo'e er bu huiguo zi xin.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei mihuo de ren,
ni zhishi yige tong women yiyang de fanren. Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua, ni jiu [gei women] xianshi yi zhong jixiang ba!”
Ta [sa li ha] shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo [zhu], zai guiding de yirizhong, ta you quan yinshui, nimen yeyou quan yinshui.
Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, zhongda zhi ri de xingfa bi chengzhi nimen.”
Dan tamen shale ta, suihou, tamen you houhuile.
Yushi xingfa chengzhile tamen. Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Lu te de zuren [yuan juzhu yu balesitan de suo duo ma cheng] ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nandao nimen yao yu renlei zhong de nanxing manzu xingyu [tongxinglian],
er fangqi nimen de zhu [an la] wei nimen chuangzao de nimen de qizi ma? Bu, nimen shi zuo'e de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Jiaru ni bu tingzhi [xuanchuan], ni bi jiang bei fangzhu.”
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Wo feichang zengwu nimen de xingwei [tongxinglian].
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiaren yuan bi tamen suo zuo de [chouxing].”
Yinci, wo zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia,
youyi wei lao fu [ta de qizi] chuwai, ta shi shuyu liu zai houmian [shou chengfa] de ren.
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren.
Wo jiang [shi] yu chengfa tamen. Bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie!
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Conglin de jumin ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, shu abu ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nimen dang yong biaozhun di chi [liang wu], nimen buyao kekou [renmen ying de zhi wu];
nimen dang yong zhunque de cheng cheng [zhu],
nimen buyao kekou renmen ying de zhi wu. Nimen buyao zai da dishang weifeizuodai.
Nimen dang jingwei chuangzao nimen he [nimen de] qian ren de zhu [an la].”
Tamen shuo:“Ni [shu abu] zhishi yige bei mihuo de ren,
ni zhishi tong women yiyang de fanren. Women dou renwei ni shi shuohuang zhe.
Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua, ni jiu shi yikuai tian luo dao women de tou shang ba!”
Ta [shu abu] shuo:“Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, wo de zhu quan zhidao.”
Dan tamen fouren ta, suoyi yin'an [wuyun] zhi ri de xingfa chengzhile tamen, na jiushi zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] de qishi.
[An la tongguo] zhongshi de shengling [ji bu li lei tianshi] ba ta [“gulanjing”] jiang zai ni [mu sheng] de xinzhong, yibian ni yong mingbai de alabo wen [zhu] jinggao renlei.
Ta [“gulanjing”] zai qian ren [shou ci] de jingdian [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] zhong dique bei ti daoguo,
yiselie de houyi zhong de xuezhemen [ru gui xin yisilan jiao de abu du la•ben•se lia mu] zhidao ta [que shi zhenshi de]. Zhe dui tamen [mai jia ren] nandao bushi yi zhong jixiang ma?
Jiaru wo ba ta [“gulanjing”] jiang gei yige fei alabo ren,
nage ren xiang tamen songdu ta [“gulanjing”], name, tamen shi jue bu hui xiangxin de.
Wo ruci shi ta [fouren “gulanjing”] jinru fanzui zhe de xinzhong.
Chufei tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa, fouze, tamen jue bu hui xiangxin ta [“gulanjing”].
Na xingfa jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi turan jianglin tamen.
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women neng bei huanxing ma?”
Nandao tamen [bushi] xiwang wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma?
Ni gaosu wo ba! Jiaru wo rang tamen xiangle shu nian,
ranhou, tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa jianglin tamen,
tamen [yiqian] suo xiangshou de dui tamen you he yichu ne?
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi [de renmin],[zhiqian] dou you jinggao zhe jiaohuiguo, wo bu hui xing bu yi.
Emomen jue buneng daizhe ta [“gulanjing”] jiang shi,
tamen [emo] ji bu shiyi zuo ci shi, tamen ye wuneng zheyang zuo.
Tamen bei zhu yuan er bu zhun ting [“gulanjing”].
Ni buyao ji qiqiu an la, you qiqiu qita shenling, fouze, ni bi chengwei shou chengfa de ren.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao ni de qinshu de buluo [zhu].
Ni dang qianhe di duidai zhuisui ni de xinshimen.
Jiaru tamen weikang ni, ni [dang dui tamen] shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo zuo de [e xing] que shi hao wu guanxi de.”
Ni dang xinlai quanneng de zhu, te ci de zhu [an la].
Dang ni [mu sheng] zhan qi libai shi, ta [an la] kanjian ni,
bing kanjian ni lu zhong [libai] koutou de dongzuo.
Ta que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
[Renmen a]! Yao wo gaosu nimen emomen hui jiang zai shei de shenshang ma?
Tamen hui jiang zai mei ge zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe de shenshang.
Tamen [zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe] ce'er qingting [emo de wangyan], tamen da duoshu ren shi shuohuang zhe.
Zhiyu shirenmen, wei mi wu zhe zhuisuizhe tamen.
Nandao ni buzhidao tamen [shirenmen] yanjiang ge zhong timu di shi [zhu] ma?
Tamen kongtan kuo lun er bu shijian.
Fan xinyang, xingshan, chang zan nian an la,[yong shi] hui ying bu yi zhi shi [yi jiao shiren feibang musilin de shi] zhe chuwai. Bu yi zhe hen kuai jiang zhidao ziji hui huode he zhong guisu.
Ta, xi [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Zhexie shi “gulanjing” de jing wen, shi yi bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [de jing wen],
shi dui xinshimen de yindao he jiayin.
Tamen [xinshi] jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quexin houshi [zhu].
Zhiyu bu xinyang houshi zhe, wo yi tamen de xingwei fenshi tamen, yin'er tamen paihuai mangcong.
[Zai jinshi], zhexie ren bi zao yanxing; zai houshi, tamen que shi zui sunshi zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] que yi shou ci cong zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”.

Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian [yuan chu you] yige huoguang, wo jiang cong nali gei nimen dai hui yixie xiaoxi lai, huo gei nimen dai hui yige ranshaozhe de huoba lai, yi gong nimen qunuan.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you shengyin han dao:“Zai huo fujin ji qi zhouwei de ren bei ci fule. Zanmei an la——zhong shijie de zhu chaojue!
Mu sa a! Zhe jiushi wo, shi an la, shi quanneng de zhu, shi zui ruizhi de zhu.

Ni reng xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na shouzhang xiang she yiyang wan yan yidong shi, ta jiu zhuanshen taoli er bu gan huigu.[An la shuo]:“Mu sa a! Ni buyao haipa, shizhemen zai wo zheli bubi haipa.
Dan xing bu yi hou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai. Wo que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Ni bashou charu huai zhong, ni chouchu shi jiang bian de jiebai yaoyan, meiyou renhe shanghai. Zhe [liang zhong jixiang] shi ni jiang xian gei falao he ta de renmin de jiu zhong jixiang de yibufen. Tamen que shi beini de minzhong.”
Dang wo de jixiang jianglin tamen shi, mingbai kejian, dan tamen queshuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Suiran tamen de neixin quexin naxie jixiang [shi cong an la jiang shi de, mu sa shi an la de shizhe], dan tamen reng bu yi he aoman de jiayi fouren. Ni dang guancha zuo'e zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wo que yi ci gei da wude he su lai man zhishi. Ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta shi women you yu ta de xuduo xinyang de puren.”
Su lai man jichengle da wude [de zhishi]. Ta [da wude] shuo:“Renmen a! Women yi bei jiaoshou niao yu, women yi bei ciyu wanwu, zhe que shi [cong an la jiang shi de] mingxian de enhui.”
You jingling, renlei he niao lei zucheng de su lai man de jundui bei jihe dao ta mianqian, tamen pailie zhengqi [daiming chuzheng].
Dang tamen daoda mayi [zhu] gu shi, yi zhi [mu] mayi shuo:“Mayimen a! Nimen gankuai duo jin nimen de dong zhong qu ba! Yimian su lai man he ta de jundui zai bu zhi bu jue shi cai si nimen.”

Ta [su lai man] bei na zhi mayi dehua [zhu] douxiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni guwu wo [bing ci wo liliang], yibian wo ganxie ni ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, yibian wo zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong. Qiu ni yi ni de enhui rang wo jinru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta jianyue zhong niao bing shuo:“Wo zenme mei kanjian dai sheng niao ne? Ta [wugu] quexile ma?
Chufei ta gei wo dai lai yi xiang heli de yuanyin, fouze, wo yiding yao yancheng ta, huo sha si ta.”
Na zhi dai sheng niao tingliu bujiu jiu laile, ta [dui su lai man] shuo:“Wo zhidao [yi jian] ni suo bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sa ba gei ni dai laile yige kekao de xiaoxi.
Wo faxian you wei funu tongzhizhe ta de zuren. Ta yingyoujinyou, hai you yige xiongwei de baozuo.
Wo faxian ta he ta de zuren dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, bing zuzhi tamen zou zhengdao, yin'er tamen wei zunxing zhengdao.
Yizhi tamen bu chongbai an la——na jieshi tiandi aomi de zhu. Fanshi nimen suo yincang de he gongkai de, ta [an la] quan zhidao.
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, ta shi weida baozuo [zhu] de zhu.” Koutou chu
ta [su lai man] shuo:“Wo yao kan ni shuo de shi shihua haishi huangyan.
Ni daizhe wo de zhe feng xin qu, ba ta tou song gei tamen, ranhou ni jiu likai tamen, kan tamen ruhe huifu.”
Ta [nage nuwang] shuo:“Zhong qing a! Wo shou daole yi feng guizhong de xin,
shi su lai man pai ren song lai de. Xin de neirong shi:“Feng pu ci te ci de an la zhi ming.
Nimen buyao dui wo aoman, nimen dang guishun de [zuowei musilin] lai jian wo.”
Ta shuo:“Zhong qing a! Nimen wei wo de shi chu ge zhuyi ba! Nimen buzai wo mianqian shi, wo cong bu jueding renhe shi.”
Tamen shuo:“Women you wuli he yongqi zhandou, zhe jian shi jiu you ni jueding, ni zhi xu kaolu ruhe xialing jiuxingle.”
Ta shuo:“Mei dang guowangmen [de jundui] jinru yige chengshi shi, tamen bi qiangjie nage chengshi, ba guizu bian wei jianmin. Tamen ye hui zheyang zuo de.
Wo yiding yao song yi jian liwu gei tamen, ranhou, kan [wo de] shijiemen neng dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”

Dang ta de shijie [ji liwu] daoda su lai man nali shi, ta [su lai man] shuo:“Nimen yao yong caiwu lai zizhu wo ma?[Xuzhi] an la ciyu wo de bi ta [an la] ciyu nimen de geng hao. Bu, nimen qu xinshang nimen de liwu ba!”

[Ranhou su lai man dui shijie de shouling shuo]:“Ni huiqu gaosu tamen ba! Wo yiding yao shuailing zhe zhi tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo yiding yao ba tamen beijian de quzhu chujing, tamen jiang hui bian cheng beijian de.”
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Zhong qing a! Zai tamen guishun de [zuowei musilin] lai jian wo zhiqian, nimen shei neng ba ta de baozuo qu lai gei wo?”
Yige qiangzhuang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi qian, wo yiding ba ta qu lai gei ni. Wo dique you nengli zuo zhe jian shi, dique zhongshi kekao.”

Yi wei you [an la de] jingdian zhishi de ren shuo:“Wo jiang zai zhuanyan zhi jian ba ta qu lai gei ni.” Dang ta [su lai man] kanjian nage baozuo fang zai ta de mianqian shi, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu ciyu de enhui, ta yi ci lai kaoyan wo, kan wo shi gan'en zhe haishi wang'enfuyi zhe. Shei gan'en, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wang'enfuyi,[shei zi shou qi hai]. Wo de zhu que shi wu suo qiu de [zhu], zungui de.”
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women guancha ta shi keyi yindao de [ren chu ta de baozuo], haishi bu keyi yindao de.”

Dang ta lai dao shi, youren [dui ta] shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zhege ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.”[Su lai man shuo]:“Zai ta zhiqian, women yi shou ci zhishi, women yi shi guishun zhe [musilin].”
Ta she an la er chongbai de yi fang'ai ta [gui xin'an la], ta yuan shi bu xinyang de minzhong.

Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian shi, ta yiwei na shige shuichi, yushi jiu [juan qi yifu] guangzhe shuang tui [xiang jinqu]. Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Zhe shi yige yong guanghua boli jiancheng de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi shi ziji shou sun, wo [xianzai] tong su lai man yiqi guishun an la ¬——zhong shijie de zhule.”

Wo que yi xiang sa mu de ren paiqianle tamen de xiongdi sa li ha.[Wo shuo]:“Nimen dang chongbai [du yi de] an la.” Dan tamen mashang fenchengle liang pai [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe], zhenglun buxiu [zhu].
Ta [sa li ha] shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Weisheme nimen zai [an la de] enhui jianglin qian yao xingfa zaori shixian ne? Weisheme nimen bu qiu an la kuanshu, yibian nimen shou ci min ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Youyu ni he zhuisui ni de ren, women yi [shou qianlian er] zao eyun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi an la zhuding [zhu] de. Bu, nimen shi ying shou kaoyan de minzhong.”
Dangshi cheng li you jiu geren [shouling zhizi], tamen zai da dishang zuo'e er bu huiguo zi xin.

Tamen [mimou] shuo:“Nimen yi an la fashi: Women yiding zai yejian mouhai ta [sa li ha] he ta de jiaren, ranhou, women jiu dui ta de jinqin shuo:“Ta de jiaren beihai shi, women bu zaichang, women shuo de dou shi shihua.”
Tamen gao yinmou, wo zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi yong jimou.
Ni dang guancha tamen de yinmou de jieju ruhe! Wo ba tamen he tamen de minzhong dou huimiele.
Zhexie shi tamen de fangwu, yinwei tamen xing bu yi er bei huimiele. Dui you zhishi de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang [jiaoxun].
Wo zhengjiule xinyang bing jingwei [an la] zhe.
[Wo que yi paiqian] lu te. Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nandao nimen yao mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi [jianyin] ma?
Nandao nimen zhen de yao she nuren er yu nanren manzu xingyu ma [tongxinglian]? Bu, nimen shi yumei wuzhi de minzhong.”
